abstract: Sixteen-year-old Kahton Anderson is sentenced to 12 years to life in prison for accidentally shooting Angel Rojas in head on Brooklyn bus in 2014 during gang fight; Anderson was convicted of second-degree murder for incident in February.

headline.print_headline: Youth Sentenced to 12 Years to Life in Killing on Bus
headline.main: Brooklyn Teenager Given 12 Years to Life for Killing Bus Passenger

snippet: Kahton Anderson, now 16, was sentenced for accidentally shooting Angel Rojas, 39, in March 2014 while firing at members of a rival gang.
lead_paragraph: Kahton Anderson, now 16, was sentenced for accidentally shooting Angel Rojas, 39, in March 2014 while firing at members of a rival gang.
